body: I bought Emerald Rank a little while ago. I have played for like an hour and a half on the server and it still wont recognize me as a Emerald member. I do not know what to do. What info should I give you guys to get it?
body_tagged: I bought Emerald Rank a little while ago. I have played for like an hour and a half on the server and it still wont recognize me as a Emerald member. I do not know what to do. What info should I give you guys to get it?
title: Question about ranks?

replies.body:
Ranks take their time to arrive. Your Emerald rank should be arriving in 2 days or less, if it doesn't arrive after 2 days, you can email support@avicus.net or contact a Sr. Staff Member via Skype.
Keep in mind you should also have the mail confirming your purchase, so you can use it as proof just in case something goes wrong.
replies.body_tagged:
Ranks take their time to arrive. Your Emerald rank should be arriving in 2 days or less, if it doesn't arrive after 2 days, you can email support@avicus.net or contact a Sr. Staff Member via Skype.
Keep in mind you should also have the mail confirming your purchase, so you can use it as proof just in case something goes wrong.

replies.body: It can take a while to get. I've donated to other servers and it took 3 hours once.
replies.body_tagged: It can take a while to get. I've donated to other servers and it took 3 hours once.

replies.body: When I bought my Emerald rank, it was receive it instantly.  But I have heard of other users having troubles receiving their ranks.  So just be patient and listen to what Gray said.
replies.body_tagged: When I bought my Emerald rank, it was receive it instantly.  But I have heard of other users having troubles receiving their ranks.  So just be patient and listen to what Gray said.

replies.body: Took me just over 2 days, be patient, it isn't easy to do.

replies.body: Actually it is easy to do.... Because it's automatic..... Sometimes it takes a while to process.... And sometimes it gets stuck, and that's when a person has to fix it. That's why some people get their rank instantly, and some don't.  Most of the time It automatically appears.
